        """Create new account for tests and save operator pre/post balances"""

        with allure.step(f"Request {NEON_AIRDROP_AMOUNT} NEON from faucet for {acc.address}"):
            faucet.request_neon(acc.address, NEON_AIRDROP_AMOUNT)
